thread.title: Juul to Ramp Up Efforts to Combat Underage Use of E-Cigarettes

author: Aisha Al-Muslim
title: Juul to Ramp Up Efforts to Combat Underage Use of E-Cigarettes
text:
E-cigarettes maker Juul Labs Inc. plans to back efforts to raise the minimum age of buying tobacco products and spend at least $30 million on measures that could help keep its items away from minors.
Juul Labs said Wednesday it would support state and federal measures that would restrict tobacco purchases to people age 21 and older. The company, one of the most popular sellers of such products in the U.S., also said it would spend money over the next three years to fund independent research, youth and parent education, and...
